item.title: React Fundamentals
item.description: 1. Building Applications With React & Flux 1.1 Introduction to React Core Tech includes: React: Components React Router: Routing Flux: Data Flows / State Management? Node/npm: Packages & Automation Babel: Transpile javascript code and components Webpack: Bundle up application for the browser ESLint: Lint. Catch errors along the way 1.2 Environment Setup We set up so as to receive rapid feedback as we build the react app We use:
